name: GrazCityBuilder
description:
=== (1) short game description ===

During the third world war almost all of the city of Graz was destroyed. Only few 
people remain but they are highly motivated to rebuild their beloved city. Now it 
is your task to manage resources and fix what is broken and restore the city skyline 
to its original glory. You have limited financial and temporal resources so you have 
to decide wisely which actions will lead you to success.
Rebuild the city with limited resources. Inhabitants will produce goods and will pay 
tax money which you can use to expand your city. Money can also be earned by public 
attractions generating revenue. Take care that your inhabitants stay happy, healthy 
and productive by providing essential infrastructure. The goal is it to build 
something at every place reserved for some sight.

Rebuild the city and make it greater than before!
